name: flux-machine
description: Spec compliant state machines using JSX, XML or JSON and chainable methods

scripts.deploy: npm run tsc-build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.tsc-build: npm run clean && npm run pre-commit && tsc --noEmit false
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run pre-commit && tsc --noEmit false && npm run bundle:esm && npm run bundle:esm:min && npm run bundle:umd && npm run bundle:umd:min && npm run build:stats
scripts.build:stats: (echo '\033[35;3m' ; cd dist && ls -lh index*js index*gz | tail -n +2 | awk '{print $5,$9}')
scripts.bundle:esm:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle --module -o dist/index.min.mjs -- dist/index.mjs && gzip -9 -c dist/index.min.mjs > dist/index.min.mjs.gz
scripts.bundle:umd:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle -o dist/index.umd.min.js -- dist/index.umd.js && gzip -9 -c dist/index.umd.min.js > dist/index.umd.min.js.gz
